input.sentences: i took my family to the local 4th of july fireworks show .
i brought both of our children | this was their first fireworks show .
they were a bit scared of the noise at first .
after a little while they got used to them and really started enjoying the show .
by the end of the night ask they could talk about was all the pretty colors .
output.sentences: I could not get the camera to focus.
I was trying to take a picture of the skyscraper.
However, my hand was still shaking after the biking accident.
I was biking, but I hit a rock and fell.
I managed to take a picture of the wheels a little bit, at least.
